item.title: Civil War
item.description: Civil War It was a blissful morning until I heard a blaring noise, A noise of an explosion followed by shrill shouts and cries. I saw a ginourmous object being dropped down from an hover, Before I could react, everything was already over. As I regained my bleared vision, I couldn’t believe my eyes, An enormous blanket of smog covered the scarlet sky. Everything was tattered and demolished from the intense mar,
